attributes.action: Legislate that premium rate text messages (SMS) often costing £1.50 which are sent unsolicited should be deemed illegal and that full compensation be awarded promptly to those who receive such messages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a growing trend for people to receive SMS messages often from adult service providers, to which the mobile phone owner/user has not subscribed.  The cost of £1.50 is debitted from the mobile phone account.  Mobile operators are not keen to  make refunds or get involved as for them it is a revenue stream.  The practice amounts to fraud and is against current law.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
